summary: THE TAKATA INFLATORS RECALL NOTICE WAS SENT TO ME ALMOST A YEAR AGO AND THERE STILL ISNT A REMEDY AND IT IS NOT SAFE TO TRANSPORT MY FAMILY IN THE VEHICLE AS WELL ITS NOT SAFE TO DRIVE ON THE ROAD FOR IF THE AIRBAG DEPLOYS AND IS FAULTY I COULD GET SERIOUSLY HURT AND CAUSE MY TO POSSIBLY HURT OTHERS IF I LOOSE CONTROL OF MY VEHICLE
